steps.title: Your Knowledge
steps.narration: You have deep knowledge about your project, your tech stack, and your goals. This is invaluable context that the AI doesn't automatically know.

steps.title: AI Response
steps.narration: Transfer that knowledge through the context window, and watch the AI transform from generic assistant to expert collaborator!

steps.title: Vague Prompts Fail
steps.narration: Vague prompts lead to generic, unhelpful responses. The AI has to guess what you want, and it usually guesses wrong.

steps.title: Rich Context Wins
steps.narration: But rich context? That produces precise, usable code. Every detail you add eliminates guesswork and guides the AI to exactly what you need!
